Wellbeing.title: Give to {others}
content: Acts of {giving} can help {giving} your mental health and by:
- creating {positive} feelings and a sense of reward - giving you a feeling of purpose and {self-worth}.
- They will often be {returned} in kind actions

Wellbeing.title: {Connect} with others
content: {Healthy relationships} are crucial for your {mental health}. They can contribute to:
- Giving you an opportunity to relate {positive} events in your life
- Providing emotional {support} for yourself and others

Wellbeing.title: Be physically {active}
content: Being {active} is not only great for your physical {health} and {fitness}. Evidence also shows it can contribute to  mental wellbeing by:
- Helping you aim high and set {goals}

Wellbeing.title: {Learn} new skills
content: {Learning} new skills can improve your mental wellbeing by:
- Allowing you to {broaden} your skill set

Revision.title: Revise... Test... {Rest}
content: 1. {Revise} for about {35 minutes}. This could be active revision, instead of just making notes
2. {Test} yourself for about {15 minutes}. You could use Quizlet for this, ask a friend or find some exam questions online
3. Take a {rest} for about {10 minutes} - do whatever you want!
